properties.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 10:04AM MST until January 12 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains
South of I-80.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
